ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌, pi lɔɔn ńkeme nyìŋ, á ne fʉa nò, pi lɔg páʼ pi ne ńjúʼu mbwó Zẅìge Ssé, ńgÿo ngàŋ piŋe na mánzsè gẅie aa ndʉŋndʉŋ. Tá ńcʉ́ʼʉ légÿo, ńdɔg pɔ́ mbʉ́lè. Wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ na pi wɔ́ɔ piŋ ḿbɔ́ɔn twó yé, ḿbɔ́gɔ légwɔ́ gie à ge gwe yé tsɛ̀ɛ nkwàʼte.
en: Brothers and sisters, if someone is overtaken in any wrongdoing, you who are spiritual, restore such a person with a gentle   spirit,  # 6:1 Or with the Spirit of gentleness,# 6:1 Ps 51:12 watching out for yourselves so that you also won’t be tempted.  # 6:1 Jms 1:13

ngiemboon: Pi kaa menò mí ḿbiʼ ńkẅéte. Pi lɔɔn ńgÿo púʼu, mbà pi gÿǒ mmó gie lepʉ̌ Keleto ne ńzɛ́te.
en: Carry one another’s burdens; in this way you will fulfill the law of Christ.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ lɔɔn ńkwaŋ ngie aa mmó, té gwɔ́ yɛ̌ mmó, mbà à sele fʉte twó mbùm yé.
en: For if anyone considers himself to be something when he is nothing,   he deceives himself.

ngiemboon: Wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ ké ńtsaʼ kwàʼ mé mefàʼ. À lɔɔn ńtsaʼ, ńgyá ngie ngwɔ́ nò poŋo yé mǒ, mbà á poŋ ngie anò gwaa poŋo yé, ńtí pɔ́ nue ée kwàʼ mefàʼ mé. Tà á le gwaa poŋo yé, ńtí pɔ́ páʼ à lʉŋté mɛ̌ mefàʼ na me petsɔ́ pʉ̀a wɔ́,
en: Let each person examine his own work,   and then he can take pride in himself alone, and not compare himself with someone else.

ngiemboon: á nue wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ gẅiin léfaʼ mé mefàʼ mie Ssé la cʉ́me mbwó yé.
en: For each person will have to carry his own load.

ngiemboon: Á poŋ ngie nyìŋ gẅie mé ne ńzíʼi yé nò Ssé, à gab shúm sé ńná se nyìŋ gẅie à ne ńzíʼi yé.
en: Let the one who is taught the word share   all his good things with the teacher.

ngiemboon: Tà nyìŋ sele fʉte twó mbùm yé, mé ee ntěen ńgwága Ssé wɔ́. Nyìŋ lɔɔn ḿbye kɔ́ wɔ́ɔ, mbà à ge láʼ káb pɔ́ yɛ̌.
en: Don’t be deceived: God is not mocked. For whatever a person sows he will also reap,

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn ḿbye shúm sie é poŋ mbùm nnɛ́ ye, mbà shúm mbùm nnɛ́ ŋwɛ́ ge láʼ gÿo à kwé, ḿbyé. Tá ńgwɔ́ gie à lɔɔn ḿbye shúm sie é poŋo Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a, mbà Zẅìge Ndʉalʉ̌a ge láʼ gÿo à gẅiin legwɔ́ temì.
en: because the one who sows to his flesh will reap destruction from the flesh, but the one who sows to the Spirit   will reap eternal life  # 6:8 Jn 12:25; Ac 13:48 from the Spirit.

ngiemboon: Tà pege ké ńkʉ́a légÿo nò mbòŋo, á nue pege lɔɔn ńgÿo nò mbòŋo ńdɔg ńgʉa pɔ́ lé mvfò, mbà fʉ̀ʼ ge láʼ kuʼ, e Ssé gÿo pege lag shúm tɛʼ.
en: Let us not get tired   of doing good,  # 6:9 Lk 18:18; Jms 4:17 for we will reap at the proper time if we don’t give up.

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, pege lɔɔn ńnyé ńgẅiin shÿó, pege gÿo nò mbòŋo mbwó pʉ̀a metsèm, ńtʉʉ lelÿò ńgÿo mbwó pʉ̀a tsìŋendá pie peg lâ pɔ̌ pǔ ńzába ntʉ́m na Keleto.
en: Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us work   for the good  # 6:10 Gn 1:31; 3Jn 11 of all, especially for those who belong to the household  # 6:10 1Tm 5:8 of faith.  # 6:10 Jd 3

ngiemboon: Pi gyá páʼ mɔɔn menÿɔ́g ŋwàʼne ge fáŋte fáŋte. Kwàʼ mèŋ Pɔ̂ɔ zɔ lɔgɔ́ pwó yɔ́ɔn ńŋweʼe yɔɔn jʉʼ!
en: Look at what large letters I use as I write to you in my own handwriting.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a pie é sẅɛ́ɛ gẅí sẅɛ́ ngie pi zẅíŋ mé púʼu gẅí, ée pʉ̀a pie é faʼa pɔ́ légÿo mmó gie á ge poŋ pà Yúndà. Pɔ́ gÿo púʼu, ńtsɔ́ɔn ngie pà Yúndà té kʉ́e wɔ́b ngie pɔ́ tyé yɔ́b pɔ́ na nò legwé Keleto á na tÿǒnkǐ wɔ́.
en: Those who want to make a good impression in the flesh   are the ones who would compel you to be circumcised  # 6:12 Ac 15:1  #— #but only to avoid being persecuted  # 6:12 2Tm 3:12 for the cross  # 6:12 Php 3:18 of Christ.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a pie é sẅɛ́ɛ gẅí púʼu, kwàʼ pɔ́b yɔ́b zɔɔn fó te kúʼte lepʉ̌ pà Yúndà ntsèm wɔ́. Tá ńké ne ńkwoŋo pɔ́ ngie mé púʼu gẅí púʼ. Púʼu, pɔ́ lɔg páʼ pɔ́ gÿǒ tà mé púʼu gẅí, ńdɔg ńŋáʼte mvfò pà Yúndà.
en: For even the circumcised don’t keep   the law themselves, and yet they want you to be circumcised in order to boast about your flesh.

ngiemboon: Ńgʉa na mèŋ, mbà mmó gie á lɔɔn ngwɔ́ n dɔg ńŋáʼte, á gwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto la kwé na tÿǒnkǐ la. Páʼ à la kwé na tÿǒnkǐ la, eshúm yɔɔn njÿó ée lejʉ́ŋ mèŋ ńcʉ́ʼ pɔ́ pfó shúm, á gʉa na mèŋ, n gwɔ́ mbwó pɔ́b, mbà n deen ńkwé.
en: But as for me, I will never boast about anything except the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ. The world has been crucified to me through the cross, and I to the world.

ngiemboon: Áa mbwó Ssé lepúʼu nyìŋ, kà lényé ngàŋ té púʼ wɔ́ɔ, à te kẅéte. Anò gie á kẅéte, á gwɔ́ páʼ nyìŋ leen sele ńcʉ́ʼʉ nyìŋ sẅé.
en: For   both circumcision and uncircumcision  # 6:15 Col 3:11 mean nothing; what matters instead is a new creation.  # 6:15 Jn 1:3; Rv 3:14

ngiemboon: E Ssé nyɛ ngie ntʉ́m wé ée mbòŋ, ḿbiŋ ńnéŋe sẅétè tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m pʉ̀a metsèm pie ée gÿo júʼ wɔɔn ntÿɔgɔ́ wesẅé, é tÿɔ́gɔ kwò mǒ, mbɔɔ mbwó pʉ̀a Ssé tà mag.
en: May peace come to all those who follow this standard, and mercy even to the Israel   of God!  # 6:16 Or And for those who follow this standard, may peace and mercy be upon them, even upon the Israel of God, or And as many who will follow this standard, peace be upon them and mercy even upon the Israel of God.

ngiemboon: Tà fó lyɛ̌ʼɔɔn, ḿbɔ́ɔn nyìŋ léláʼ ńgíŋ ńdɔgɔ yɔɔn nò ńgege wɔ́ɔn. Melǎg fʉ̌ŋ mie n gẅiin, é laʼte ngie n gwɔ̌ pɔ́ nyìŋ Yěsô.
en: From now on, let no one cause me trouble, because I bear on my body the marks of Jesus.

ngiemboon: Mefɛ̌ pɔ́ɔn, á poŋ ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto lɔgɔ légwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m pi, ńcÿó gʉm gí! Amɛn!
en: Brothers and sisters, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.   Amen.
